document.full_text: conor madden, who is portraying the melancholy danish prince in a production in cork, ireland, was wounded beneath his eye during a sword fight on monday.
document.title: actor is injured in irish production of 'hamlet'
lines_and_colors: conor madden, who is portraying the melancholy danish prince in a production in cork, ireland, was wounded beneath his eye during a sword fight on monday.
